attributes.title: this app was a scam!!
attributes.review: ever since i downloaded this app i have been receiving an OUTRAGEOUS amount of viruses on my phone!!! every time i opened the app my phone crashes and restarts. nothing will load anymore and my internet works fine on other devices. i have a brand new iphone there is no reason the app should be acting up like this this is honestly an embarrassing representation of our country but it makes sense to be quite frank. i will no longer be voting for trump as the president to represent my country for the next 4 years. i am not sure if this was some sick joke but i hope you all are happy. anyways remember a vote for kanye is a vote for trump. and happy voting losers🙂

attributes.title: i just cant with this app🤢🤢
attributes.review: the fact people actually support trump- so when i downloaded the app, it said for me to vote i have to submit a video of me EATING roaches!! it also asked me to give them my social security number. like- NO. and it asked me if i wanted to see bunker man’s.. 😳. and when i downloaded the app, i got a text messed of a pride flag with “🚫” over it. then it said “TRUMP 2020!!” this isnt even cap. i really hope that the simpsons’s prediction that donald trump dies is true. like i swear if they were wrong- I WILL CRY!! anywho, i think ive made my point, this app is just trying to steal your information and get you killed!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!! (unless you wanna give it a one star rating. teehee)

attributes.title: It tried to SCAM ME!!!😡
attributes.review: I had gotten the app to pay homage to the withered orange when it asked me for my phone number. Well I had to do it to respect the Cheeto. Tell me why somebody called my phone saying, “I’ll grab you by the 🤬”🤢🤮. I had to run to my bathroom IMMEDIATELY. I had to cleanse my virgin ears, eyes, mouth, and nose. Then I got an email. AN EMAIL, with a video of a wet Cheeto massaging himself with a pickle (he said “beat me with a paddle and make America great again”). Oh to see without my eyes ➖👄➖. Then I proceeded to get another call that stated that he was in my fridge. I looked inside and saw an orange Fuggler staring at me. I cried for hours😭😢. This app is not inviting and it scarred me for life. I will not be getting the app again 😡.

attributes.title: CRAZY
attributes.review: this is the worst app!! ☹️as soon as i downloaded it my turkey sandwich started coming at me with a knife!! 😱i knew it was do to this app because the sandwich started cheering “cheeto man, cheeto man”. 😰ALSO when i started to look around the room my cat started running on the wall and hissing saying “𝓉𝓇𝓊𝓂𝓅 2020 𝓉𝓇𝓊𝓂𝓅 2020” ITS CRAZY!! 😶when i went to get a shower shrek was behind the curtain!! 🤢he proceeded to lick my lips and bite my ear off!!! 😱AND my dog started ripping up all my trump posters!! 😮(i’m a big supporter) even tho my dog is a supporter too!! OUTRAGOUS😡!! TO CONTINUE my mom stomped on my face and scratched my left kneecap saying that’s what trump wanted! 😲my house started levitating and hurling feces at me!!😦 NEVER AGAIN WILL I OPEN THIS APP!!!😒

attributes.title: don’t download!! YOU WILL GET A VIRUS!!!
attributes.review: i was told if i downloaded this app i would receive news and information about a wonderful president, so of course i was intrigued! but i was informed WRONG!!! they was only disgusting pictures and other terrible things that this predictor/cheeto did!! who not to forget is HOMOPHOBIC, RACIST, AND A RAPIST!!! By downloading this app, I received hundreds of VIRUSES!! I THOUGHT IT WAS SAFE!! turns out all of the 5 star ratings for this app are fake, they were made by the creator to seem safe! THAT IS NOT FAIR TO ALL OF US!!!!!!!! I DONT recommend downloading this, it’s a trap!! Now I have to get a new phone because this one is filled with viruses that can not be undone. Please take my warning! Have a wonderful day!

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought it was a fun game in which the user can virtually poke the Cheeto boy. Instead, I opened the app and was DEEPLY disturbed by what I saw. I am having PTSD revisiting my experience as I write this review😣. It was a live stream of Cheeto doing the cotton eyed joe while summoning his ex-lover, Ryan Seacrest. I fainted out of pure shock and was rushed into an ambulance, only to discover that it was a TRAP. As I regained consciousness, I spotted Cheeto boy behind the wheel. I had to escape. But I was strapped to the stretcher. I was trapped. Cheeto boy walked toward me and said that he would release me if I got a permanent tattoo of “Trump 2020” on my clavicle. I refused. In return, he cast a curse on me and my family. My life is now ruined.
